metadata.name: Indian Yellow-Orange
metadata.description:
I saw this passage at the front gates of Taj Mahal in India. I waited there a little bit and made my composition before. Then a pregnant woman came by with matching colors on her dress. I just asked if I can get a picture with her because everything looks perfect to shoot. She just smiled and gave me permission. This is how I shoot one of my favorite photos from India.

Photographer: Masis Usenmez
Bio: EFIAP honored, award-winning Armenian origin Turkish street and documentary photographer based in France.

Edition: 1/1
